languages.text: "Его слова... Он старается их перекрасить яркими фальшивыми оттенками, но горе и испуг несут в себе слишком много черно-серого. На что же он надеется?"
"His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
languages.original_text: "Его слова... Он старается их перекрасить яркими фальшивыми оттенками, но горе и испуг несут в себе слишком много черно-серого. На что же он надеется?"

traits.locale_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his woeful terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
"His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his woeful terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
"His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
"His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
"His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
"His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"

languages.text: « Ses allégations... Il cherche à les maquiller à grand renfort de fausses teintes criardes, mais sa terreur abjecte porte en elle trop de noir et de gris. C'est à se demander où il veut en venir. »
languages.original_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"

traits.locale_text: « Ses allégations... Il cherche à les maquiller à grand renfort de fausses teintes criardes, mais sa terreur abjecte porte en elle trop de noir et de gris. C'est à se demander où il veut en venir. »

languages.text: «Sus palabras... intenta usar tonos ostentosos y falsos para ocultarlo, pero su terror abyecto está lleno de negro y gris. ¿Qué busca con esto?».
languages.original_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras... intenta usar tonos ostentosos y falsos para ocultarlo, pero su terror abyecto está lleno de negro y gris. ¿Qué busca con esto?».

languages.text: “他的话……他打算用花哨的色调掩饰真相，但他的恐惧之中却夹杂了那么多黑色与灰色。他说这些话，究竟是出于什么目的？”
languages.original_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"

traits.locale_text: “他的话……他打算用花哨的色调掩饰真相，但他的恐惧之中却夹杂了那么多黑色与灰色。他说这些话，究竟是出于什么目的？”

languages.text: 「彼の言葉は…彼は偽の派手な色合いで塗りつぶそうとしているが、絶望的な恐怖は黒色と灰色で覆われている。彼はこんな状態で、何を成し遂げるつもりだ？」
languages.original_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼の言葉は…彼は偽の派手な色合いで塗りつぶそうとしているが、絶望的な恐怖は黒色と灰色で覆われている。彼はこんな状態で、何を成し遂げるつもりだ？」

languages.text: "Seine Worte ... Er versucht, sie mit gefälschten, grellen Farben zu übermalen, doch seine unerträgliche Angst bringt zu viel Schwarz und Grau mit sich. Was hofft er dadurch zu erreichen?"
languages.original_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"

traits.locale_text: "Seine Worte ... Er versucht, sie mit gefälschten, grellen Farben zu übermalen, doch seine unerträgliche Angst bringt zu viel Schwarz und Grau mit sich. Was hofft er dadurch zu erreichen?"

languages.text: "Sözleri... Onları cafcaflı sahte renk tonlarıyla boyamaya çalışıyor. Fakat sefil dehşeti, nice siyah ve gri taşıyor. Bu şekilde gerçekleştirmeye çalıştığı nedir?"
languages.original_text: "His words... He is trying to paint them over with fake garish hues, but his abject terror carries with it too much black and grey. What does he hope to accomplish with this?"
